SELECT A.BIN_PromotionActivityID AS activeID, A.ActivityCode AS activityCode, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag, A.ActivityName AS activityName, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, A.ActivitySetBy, A.SendFlag, isnull(A.Status,1) AS status, B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID, C.BasePropValue1 AS startTime, C.BasePropValue2 AS endTime, E.GroupName AS groupName, RU.RuleCode, us.ValidFlag AS userValidFlag, em.EmployeeName AS createUserName FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A LEFT JOIN Privilege.BIN_User us WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.ActivitySetBy = us.BIN_UserID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp D ON(C.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = D.BIN_PromotionBasePropID AND D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_time') LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp E ON(A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = E.BIN_PromotionActGrpID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee em ON (us.BIN_EmployeeID = em.BIN_EmployeeID) LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule RU ON(A.ActivityCode = RU.RuleCode AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = RU.BIN_BrandInfoID)
JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult F ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = F.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND F.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prmProductId# AND F.SaleType = #prtType# AND F.ValidFlag = '1')
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#
A.ActivityCode = #activityCode#
A.ValidFlag = '1'
(A.ActivityName like '%' + #searchPrmActiveName# + '%')
left(C.BasePropValue1,10) > #sysTime#
left(C.BasePropValue1,10) <= #sysTime# AND left(C.BasePropValue2,10) >= #sysTime#
left(C.BasePropValue2,10) < #sysTime#
A.TemplateFlag = '1'
(A.TemplateFlag IS NULL OR A.TemplateFlag='0' OR A.TemplateFlag ='')
( ( left(C.BasePropValue1,10) >= #searchPrmStartDate# AND left(C.BasePropValue1,10) <= #searchPrmEndDate# ) OR ( left(C.BasePropValue2,10) >= #searchPrmStartDate# AND left(C.BasePropValue2,10) <= #searchPrmEndDate# ) OR ( left(C.BasePropValue1,10) >= #searchPrmStartDate# AND left(C.BasePropValue2,10) <= #searchPrmEndDate# ) OR ( left(C.BasePropValue1,10) <= #searchPrmStartDate# AND left(C.BasePropValue2,10) >= #searchPrmEndDate# ) )
E.ActivityType = #activeType#
E.GroupCode = #groupCode#
EXISTS ( select 1 from Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C2 JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp D2 ON(C2.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = D2.BIN_PromotionBasePropID) where B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = C2.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C2.ValidFlag = '1' AND ( (C2.BasePropValue1 ='all' AND D2.PropertyName = 'baseProp_city') OR (C2.BasePropValue1 = #cntCode# AND D2.PropertyName = 'baseProp_counter')
(C2.BasePropValue1 =#cityId# AND D2.PropertyName = 'baseProp_city')
(C2.BasePropValue1 = #channelId# AND D2.PropertyName = 'baseProp_channal')
) )
and not EXISTS (select 1 from Promotion.BIN_CampaignCounterBlack where RuleCode = A.ActivityCode and CounterCode = #cntCode# and ValidFlag = '1')
( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis AT WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN ( SELECT BIN_OrganizationID FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_UserID = #userId# AND (BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = '1') AND DepartType = '4' UNION ALL select -8888 ) A99 ON (A99 .BIN_OrganizationID = AT.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE AT.MainCode = A.ActivityCode ) or A.ActivitySetBy = #userId# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP $INDSEARCH_COUNT$ A.BIN_PromotionProductID AS bin_PromotionProductID, A.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode
,A.NameTotal AS nameTotal
,A.NameForeign AS nameTotal
,A.NameTotal AS nameTotal
FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct A, Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor B WHERE A.BIN_PromotionProductID = B.BIN_PromotionProductID AND A.UnitCode <> #TZZK_UNIT_CODE# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND ( A.unitCode Like '%' + #searchPrmProduct# + '%' OR B.barCode Like '%' + #searchPrmProduct# + '%' OR A.nameTotal Like '%' + #searchPrmProduct# + '%' OR A.nameForeign Like '%' + #searchPrmProduct# + '%' )AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#

SELECT TOP $INDSEARCH_COUNT$ ci.CounterCode AS counterCode
,oz.DepartName AS departName
,oz.NameForeign AS departName
,oz.DepartName AS departName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON (ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
) dp ON (oz.BIN_OrganizationID = dp.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND (ci.CounterCode Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' OR oz.DepartName Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' OR oz.NameForeign Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%') AND ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $INDSEARCH_COUNT$ br.BIN_RegionID AS regionID
,br.RegionNameChinese AS cityName
,br.RegionNameForeign AS cityName
,br.RegionNameChinese AS cityName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON (ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
) dp ON(oz.BIN_OrganizationID=dp.BIN_OrganizationID), Basis.BIN_Region brd, Basis.BIN_Region br WHERE brd.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(br.NodeID)=1 AND ci.BIN_RegionID = brd.BIN_RegionID AND br.ValidFlag = '1' AND brd.ValidFlag = '1' AND ( br.RegionNameChinese Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' OR br.RegionNameForeign Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' )AND ci.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $INDSEARCH_COUNT$ bc.BIN_ChannelID AS channelID
,bc.ChannelName AS channelName
,bc.ChannelNameForeign AS channelName
,bc.ChannelName AS channelName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON (ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
) dp ON oz.BIN_OrganizationID=dp.BIN_OrganizationID, Basis.BIN_Channel bc WHERE bc.ValidFlag = '1' AND bc.BIN_ChannelID = ci.BIN_ChannelID AND ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND ( bc.ChannelName Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' OR bc.ChannelNameForeign Like '%' + #searchPrmLocation# + '%' ) AND ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $INDSEARCH_COUNT$ A.ActivityCode AS activityCode, A.ActivityName AS activityName FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A WHERE A.ActivityName Like '%' + #searchPrmActiveName# + '%' AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $number$ A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID AS groupId, A.GroupName AS groupName, A.GroupCode AS groupCode FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp A WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND (A.GroupName Like '%' + #paramInfoStr# + '%' OR A.GroupCode Like '%' + #paramInfoStr# + '%') AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#
SELECT A.BrandCode AS actBrandCode FROM Basis.BIN_BrandInfo A WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #actBrandInfoID# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #actOrganizationInfoID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BIN_PromotionActivityID AS activeID, A.ActivityCode AS mainCode, A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID AS mainClassID, A.ActivityName AS mainName, A.Times AS maxReceiveQty, A.ChangeableFlag AS mainModify, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS actBrandInfoID, A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS actOrganizationInfoID FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' and (A.TemplateFlag IS NULL OR A.TemplateFlag='0' OR A.TemplateFlag ='')
A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#
A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#

SELECT A.NameTotal AS nameTotal, B.SalePrice AS salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionPrice B on A.BIN_PromotionProductID = B.BIN_PromotionProductID AND B.ValidFlag ='1', Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor C WHERE A.UnitCode = #promotionPrtUnitcode# AND C.BarCode = #promotionPrtCode# AND A.BIN_PromotionProductID = C.BIN_PromotionProductID AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.ValidFlag AS status, A.ActivityCode AS mainCode, C.BasePropValue1 AS startTime, C.BasePropValue2 AS endTime, E.BasePropValue1 AS counterID, F.BasePropValue1 AS cityID, G.BasePropValue1 AS channelID, C.ConditionGrpID AS conditionGrpID, D.PromotionPrtUnitcode AS promotionPrtCode, D.Price AS price, D.Quantity AS activityQty FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A, Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B, Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition E on (C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = E.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ConditionGrpID = E.ConditionGrpID AND E.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_counter# AND E.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition F on (C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = F.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ConditionGrpID = F.ConditionGrpID AND F.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_city# AND F.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition G on (C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = G.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ConditionGrpID = G.ConditionGrpID AND G.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_channal# AND G.ValidFlag = '1'), Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult D WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = D.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1' AND D.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND C.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_time#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#
ORDER BY conditionGrpID

SELECT ci.CounterCode AS counterID FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON (ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
) dp ON oz.BIN_OrganizationID=dp.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN Basis.BIN_Region B ON (ci.BIN_RegionID = B.BIN_RegionID) WHERE ci.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND (B.RegionType = '2' OR B.RegionType = '3') AND B.BIN_RegionID = #cityID# ANDAND ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1' B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.CounterCode AS cntCode, CONVERT(nvarchar,A.BIN_ChannelID) AS channelId, CONVERT(nvarchar,B.BIN_CityID) AS cityId FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationID = #prmCounterId#

SELECT ci.CounterCode AS counterID FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON (ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
) dp ON oz.BIN_OrganizationID=dp.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel B ON (ci.BIN_ChannelID = B.BIN_ChannelID) WHERE ci.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID# AND ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID# AND B.BIN_ChannelID = #channelID# AND AND ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1' B.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT C.PromotionPrtCode AS promotionPrtCode, C.PromotionPrtUnitcode AS promotionPrtUnitcode, C.Price AS price, C.Quantity AS quantity FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A, Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B, Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult C WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #bin_OrganizationInfoID#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ActivityAssociateTable_SCS ( Brand, MainCode, MainName, MaxReceiveQty, MainClassID, MainModify ) VALUES ( #brandCode#, #mainCode#, #mainName#, #maxReceiveQty#, #mainClassID#, #mainModify# )

INSERT PromotionTable_SCS ( Brand, PromotionPrtCode, PromotionPrtPrice, PromotionPrtBClassName, PromotionPrtBClassCode, PromotionPrtMClassName, PromotionPrtMClassCode, PromotionPrtLClassName, PromotionPrtLClassCode, PromotionPrtBarcode, PromotionPrtUnitcode, PromotionPrtStock, CHYFlag ) VALUES ( #brandCode#, #nameTotal#, #salePrice#, #promotionClassName#, #promotionClassCode#, #promotionClassName#, #promotionClassCode#, #promotionClassName#, #promotionClassCode#, #promotionPrtCode#, #promotionPrtCode#, #promotionPrtStock#, '1' )

INSERT ActivityTable_SCS ( Brand, ActivityCode, ActivityName, StartTime, EndTime, Barcode, Price, ActCounter, Status, MainCode, ActivityQty, CHYFlag ) VALUES ( #brandCode#, #activeCode#, #activityName#, #startTime#, #endTime#, #promotionPrtCode#, #price#, #counterID#, #status#, #mainCode#, #activityQty#, '1' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ActivityCode AS mainCode, B.BrandCode AS brandCode FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo B ON(A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity SET Status = '1' WHERE ActivityCode = #activityCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
UPDATE Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule SET Status = '1' WHERE RuleCode = #activityCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
